mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENU (RESTAURANT_ID, MENU, CALORIE, DATE) VALUES (#{restaurantId}, #{menu}, #{calorie}, #{date})
mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID AS menuId, RESTAURANT_ID AS restaurantId, MENU AS menu, CALORIE AS calorie, DATE AS date FROM MENU WHERE RESTAURANT_ID = #{restaurantId} AND DATE BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY DATE ASC, MENU_ID ASC
